FG%.name: Field Goal Percentage
FG%.strategy: Target high-efficiency players (big men, slashers). Avoid high-volume low-efficiency shooters.

FT%.name: Free Throw Percentage
FT%.strategy: Target guards and wings. Avoid poor FT shooters (some centers). Can punt if building around bigs.

3PTM.name: 3-Point Shots Made
3PTM.strategy: Target high-volume 3-point shooters. Guards and modern wings are key.

PTS.name: Points Scored
PTS.strategy: Target high-usage scorers. Correlates with minutes and role.

REB.name: Total Rebounds
REB.strategy: Target big men and versatile forwards. Double-double machines are valuable.

AST.name: Assists
AST.strategy: Target point guards and playmakers. High usage + low turnovers ideal.

ST.name: Steals
ST.strategy: Target perimeter defenders and gambling defenders. Hardest cat to find.

BLK.name: Blocked Shots
BLK.strategy: Target rim protectors and tall forwards. Elite shot blockers are scarce.

TO.name: Turnovers
TO.strategy: MINIMIZE turnovers. Avoid high-usage ball-handlers if they turn it over. Low-usage players help.
